title.rendered: Vietnam market entry, strategy and compliance requirements

content.rendered:
Our speaker will provide a comprehensive overview of the best practices for exploring the Vietnam market and planning for successful market entry. During the session, he will cover various aspects such as tax benefits specifically applicable to manufacturing companies operating in Vietnam, accounting and tax compliance requirements for Vietnamese entities, and a practical guide to ensure compliance with labour laws, customs regulations, and other relevant regulations. By delving into these key areas, attendees will gain valuable insights and knowledge to navigate the complexities of the Vietnam market and make informed business decisions.

Speaker

Rizwan Kwan, Partner, Acclime Vietnam
